name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 19, Chongqing held a press conference on the gas investigation. It ordered Chongqing Gas Group to fully refund the wrongly collected or overcharged gas fees and recommended that Che Dechen, secretary of the Chongqing Gas Group Party Committee, be removed from his post.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/5t9shKCSDx

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 19, it was reported online that a student at Xiangtan University had his takeaway food stolen frequently, and the student who stole the takeaway food was poisoned to death.
On the morning of the 19th, the Propaganda Department of the Party Committee of Xiangtan University told reporters that the online rumor that the student who stole the takeaway food was poisoned was not true, and other circumstances were still under investigation.
On April 20, the local police reported that a Xiangtan student went to the hospital for medical treatment due to physical discomfort on April 7, and died of multiple organ failure on the 13th. His roommate is a major suspect in the crime.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 19, in front of the Jinnan District Government of Tianjin, the second phase of Furong Mansion in Xiaozhan Town, Jinnan District, Tianjin was left unfinished, and the owners knelt down and demanded to see the district mayor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another theory

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 20, Xi'an CRRC Changchun Railway Vehicles Co., Ltd. issued a notice stating that the cause of the accident was improper handling by the test personnel, resulting in the rear-end collision of the vehicles, causing partial damage to the vehicles. The cause of the accident is currently under analysis and investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/jfRv3pDfYX

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 18, in Haikou, Hainan, a man near Yusha Road smashed cars and beat people with a pole, and was finally subdued by several food delivery boys.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 19, a netizen posted a message saying that Tianjin will conduct a survey on the family population and the age of various home appliances in response to the "Action Plan for Promoting the Replacement of Old Consumer Goods for New Consumer Goods" issued by the State Council.
According to screenshots of group chats posted by netizens, residents were asked to fill out a "Wuqing District Home Appliance Replacement Demand Survey Form"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 19, in Kunshan City, Suzhou, an auntie who was setting up a street stall encountered an urban management patrol and confiscated her stall, so she distributed the cakes to the onlookers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 19, at a middle school in Longnan, Gansu, students in unison demanded a "double day off" on the playground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 19, Zhejiang. A woman posted a video saying that her mother was diagnosed with lung cancer last year. In order to treat her mother, she worked in a company during the day and worked part-time as a food delivery worker at night. She even went into debt of 200,000 yuan to raise enough money for her mother's surgery. However, her mother's health was getting worse and worse. After asking her sister, she learned that her mother had used the money she saved to buy skin care products from a blogger.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 20, an electric bike caught fire on Luoxi Bridge in Guangzhou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 19, Heyuan, Guangdong. Residents of Pengzhai Town reported that every night, nearby factories would secretly discharge sewage into the residential area, polluting nearly 10,000 acres of land downstream that provided drinking water.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 20, owners of Phoenix Lake, Country Garden, Yantai, Shandong, defended their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Wenzhou. Due to the administrative agreement and administrative compensation disputes caused by the reclamation of the tidal flats, 1,735 villagers of Wuxi Village sued the People's Government of Longwan District, Wenzhou City in the name of the village collective.
At first, the heads of the village committee and the cooperative disagreed with the lawsuit, but more than half of the 1,735 villagers filed a lawsuit in the name of the village collective and the case was accepted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 20, Henan. The blogger interviewed a man who was working with a prosthesis on a construction site. The man said that he lost one leg in a car accident. Because there were still two months before the wheat harvest, he came out to work as a temporary worker. Now he can earn about 100 yuan a day. However, because his wife ran away and his daughter was left unattended, he had to work with his daughter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The school is Longnan Huixian No.1 Middle School

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 20, a student from Hebei Academy of Fine Arts participated in a sketching activity organized by the school. During the process, he fell from a building and suffered comminuted fractures all over his body. 
His grandmother protested at the school gate for several consecutive days

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 16, Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street, Shanghai.
A pair of dancers were dancing on the street. An on-duty officer tried to pull them apart, but was dissuaded by another on-duty officer. Afterwards, the two on-duty officers took out their phones to record the two and collect evidence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 20 (Released) A Hengyang netizen posted a video saying that his 83-year-old mother-in-law went to the Social Security Bureau in person with her ID card to extend her social security, but was told by the staff that she must hold up a newspaper and ID card of the day to prove that she was still alive.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to the New York Times, 23 Chinese swimmers tested positive for doping before the 2021 Tokyo Olympics. The Chinese Anti-Doping Agency determined that they had unknowingly ingested the drug from drugged food.
At the time, the World Anti-Doping Agency and other governing bodies accepted China's findings and allowed them to compete.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 19 (Released) Nanchang, Jiangxi. Aux Electronics Factory recently lowered its wages, with the original hourly wage of 27 yuan being reduced to 23 yuan, triggering a strike by employees in protest.
During the protest, some employees were forcibly taken away by the police.
